trans-unit.source: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA encryption or decryption operations.

Creates a new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance whose <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*> is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref> with the given hash algorithm.
The hash algorithm.
An object whose mode is is with the hash algorithm specified by hashAlgorithm.
The property of hashAlgorithm is either or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified object.

`obj` is equal to the current instance if it is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object and the two objects have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.
The object to compare.
if obj is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .
Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> object.

`instance` and the current instance are equal if they have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.
The object to compare.
if other is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .
Returns the hash code of this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> object.
The hash code of this instance.
Gets the padding mode represented by this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance.
A padding mode.
Gets the hash algorithm used in conjunction with the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref> padding mode.

If the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*> property is not <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The hash algorithm.
Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA-384 hash algorithm.
An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA384 hash algorithm.
Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> objects are equal.

Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are equal.
The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> objects are unequal.

Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are not equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are not equal.
The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.
An object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.
Returns the string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance.

The string representation of a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object is the concatenation of its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and `OaepHashAlgorithm.Name` properties.
The string representation of the current object.
